name: Think Ahead
text: Draw two cards. Put one card from your hand on top of your deck.\nRecycle 1.

name: Interrupt
text: Contest INT with any enemy. If you win, counter target ability that enemy controls.

name: Borrowed Time
text: Gain 3 energy. Attach this to yourself for 3 turns. At the start of your turn, replenish 1 less energy.

name: Hold Monster
text: Contest ARC vs WIL with any enemy. If you win, attach this card to that enemy. That enemy can't take actions. At the end of that enemy's turn, contest ARC vs WIL. If you lose, discard this card.

name: Haste
text: Attach to any ally. At that start of that ally's turn, they replenish 2 additional energy.

name: Consider
text: Scry 2. Draw a card.\nRecycle 1.

name: Resistance
text: Target ally gains 1 Armor until the end of their next turn.

name: Block
text: Attach to any ally. The next time they would take physical damage, reduce that by STR3.

name: Cleave
text: Make a melee weapon attack against each adjacent enemy.\nAttack Augment: Deal 1 damage to each adjacent enemy

name: Feint
text: Deal STR1 damage to an adjacent enemey. The next time you would take damage from that enemy, reduce that damage by an additional STR3, and then make a weapon attack against them.

name: Guard Stance
text: Your and your adjacent allies physical damage resistance is increased by 1

name: Duelist's Stance
text: When you make a melee attack that targets one enemy, increase the depth of your augment by 2.

name: Taunt
text: Attach this to yourself for 1 turn. Each enemy must target you if possible.

name: Power Through
text: Heal yourself for WIL3.\nAugment: Heal yourself for 1

name: Ricochet
text: Make a ranged weapon attack against an enemy, then another enemy, then a third enemy. Each subsequent attack deals 1 less damage.

name: Imbue Elements
text: Attach to yourself. Your weapon attacks deal an additional 1 Fire, Frost, or Earth damage.\nAttack Augment: Deal 1 Fire, Frost, or Earth damage

name: Pin Down
text: Make a ranged weapon attack against an enemy. If this is in response to a movement by that enemy, instead make 3 ranged weapon attacks against them.

name: Summon Forest
text: Summon a tree to your or an adjacent space. While in a tree, a character has one additional depth to their ranged attacks, and takes 1 less damage from ranged attacks.

name: Summon Vines
text: Summon vines to a space for 3 turns. Characters who start their turn or move to a space with vines become immobilized, and take PRM3 damage.

name: Stunning Shot
text: Make a ranged weapon attack against an enemy. That enemy recovers 2 less energy on their next turn.

name: Aimed Shot
text: Make a ranged weapon attack with + 2 Depth. You may choose a second card from the revealed cards, and include it's attributes and augments to your attack.
